data.descriptor: Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a LC : Annexure B2
data.caption: Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a LC - Annexure B2
data.news_body:
Format of the Annual Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1 Name of Company RACL Geartech Ltd
2 CIN NO. L34300DL1983PLC016136
3 Report filed for FY 2024-2025
Details of the Current block (all figures in Rs crore):
4 2 - year block period (Specify financial years)* 0
5 Incremental borrowing done in FY (T)(a) 0.00
6 Mandatory borrowing to be done through debt securities in FY (T) (b) = (25% of a) 0.00
7 Actual borrowing done through debt securities in FY (T)(c) 0.00
8 Shortfall in the borrowing through debt securities if any for FY (T - 1) carried forward to FY (T) (d) 0
8Quantum of (d) which has been met from (c)(e)* 0
9 Shortfall if any in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities for FY (T) { after adjusting for any shortfall in borrowing for FY(T - 1) which was carried forward to FY(T)}(f) = (b) - [(c) - (e)]{ If the calculated value is zero or negative write nil}* 0


Details of penalty to be paid if any in respect to previous block (all figures in Rs crore):
2 - year Block period (Specify financial years)0
Amount of fine to be paid for the block if applicable Fine = 0.2% of {(d) - (e)}#0.00



Name of the Company Secretary :-Neha Bahal
Designation :-Company Secretary Compliance Officer
Name of the Chief Financial Officer :- Jitender Jain
Designation : -Chief Financial Officer

Date: 30/04/2025

10 2025
data.news_body:

Placement in accordance with the Companies Act 2013 read with the rules made there under
and Chapter V of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Issue of Capital Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2018

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 31A Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
We hereby inform you that the Company has received approvals from respective Stock Exchanges approving the reclassification of the below mentioned from "Promoter/Promoter Group" to "Public" category. 
Mr. Dev Raj Arya
Ms. Raj Arya.

Kindly take this information on record and oblige.

data.caption: Intimation About Inauguration Of New Manufacturing Facility For BMW Electric Parking Lock Mechanism
data.news_body: We are pleased to announce the official inauguration of our new manufacturing facility named as "UDYAM" for BMW electric car parking lock mechanism.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Intimation about Resignation of Mr. Ritesh Arora Joint General Manager (HR & Admin) designated as Senior Management Personnel (SMP) of the Company w.e.f February 09 2025.

data.caption: Intimation About Strategic Nomination For Joint Development Of Electric Power Steering System For Passenger Cars.
data.news_body: RACL Geartech Limited has signed a strategic nomination with ZF Rane (a ZF Group Company) for joint development of electric power steering system for passenger cars.

data.caption: Intimation Of Recognition: NABL Accreditation As Per ISO/IEC 17205: 2017
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities Exchange Board of India (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform that RACL Geartech Limited Metallurgical Testing Lab Gajraula is accredited by National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories (NABL) as per ISO/IEC 17025: 2017- Laboratory Management System which is valid up to 21/01/2029.

data.caption: RACL Announces Operational Readiness Of New Manufacturing Facility For BMW Electric Car Parking Lock Mechanism
data.news_body:
The Company would like to inform about the operational readiness for dedicated facility for manufacturing location at Gajraula. Trial Production has been accomplished & Pre-Series production has been started.

This is for your information and record purpose.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter And Nine-Months Ended 31.12.2020
data.news_body:
In compliance with the provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we would like to hereby inform that the Board of Directors of the Company, in its meeting held on Saturday, 13th February, 2021, which commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 07:00 P.M., inter alia considered and approved the following:
a. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2020, as reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company.
b. Interim Dividend on the equity shares of the Company @ 10%, i.e. Re. 1.00 per share of face value of Rs. 10.00 each.
c. Record Date for the Interim Dividend as 25th February, 2020.

The aforesaid Results along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors in compliance with Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith.

Kindly take the above information on your records and oblige.

In compliance with the provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we would like to hereby inform that the Board of Directors of the Company, in its meeting held on Saturday, 13th February, 2021, which commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 07:00 P.M., inter alia considered and approved the following:
a. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2020, as reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company.
b. Interim Dividend on the equity shares of the Company @ 10%, i.e. Re. 1.00 per share of face value of Rs. 10.00 each.
c. Record Date for the Interim Dividend as 25th February, 2020.

The aforesaid Results along with the Limited Review Report by the Statutory Auditors in compliance with Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith.
